title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1704.1 - Description
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1704.1 - Description

State Regulations
(a) This Part is
designed to describe the minimum standards with regard to those items necessary
for an inmate's cleanliness, health and morale. (b) Personal and frequent inspection by the
superintendent and daily supervision by assigned staff shall be carried out to
insure compliance with these standards. (c) This Part is not intended to cover
special housing units; see Part 302 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
1704.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
